d1d364cd-2b1b-4b59-8321-e48e0d37feac.description: Earners of the Tableau Desktop Specialist title use their foundational knowledge of Tableau Desktop and data analytics to solve problems. They have demonstrated understanding of Tableau core concepts and terminology. Desktop Specialists are able to connect to, prepare, explore and analyze data, and share their insights.
d1d364cd-2b1b-4b59-8321-e48e0d37feac.name: Tableau Desktop Specialist

2b4f4929-190a-4274-880f-3be6cbcaef8b.description: Earners of the Tableau Desktop Certified Associate title are proficient users of the features and functionality of Tableau Desktop to analyze data and solve problems. They can apply mapping, data preparation, and calculation skills in more advanced data analysis.
2b4f4929-190a-4274-880f-3be6cbcaef8b.name: Tableau Desktop Certified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Pass two-hour, hands-on, proctored Desktop Certified Associate exam
This exam is now retired. Click here to see all available certification offerings.

0bf4a849-abfc-4ec4-a346-182ec2f27c04.description: Earners of the Get Started with Tableau Skill Badge have shown competency in the foundational skills needed to start data analysis with Tableau. The skills acquired with this badge include core data literacy and Tableau concepts, and creating a Tableau workbook with basic charts.
0bf4a849-abfc-4ec4-a346-182ec2f27c04.name: Get Started with Tableau

58ed00e5-3079-4628-8f15-f7a0dfd7778f.description: Earners of the Connect to and Transform Data Skill Badge have shown competency in connecting to data sources, cleaning, shaping, and combining data, revising the properties of a data source, and saving those customizations.
58ed00e5-3079-4628-8f15-f7a0dfd7778f.name: Connect to and Transform Data

664bb74a-a208-4728-a3d6-4468eb01c8a0.description: Earners of the Associate Consultant title are proficient at engaging with customers and enabling the realization of business value by implementing solutions within the Tableau platform that meet best practices for visual design, performance, scalability, adoption, and governance by using the Tableau Blueprint methodology.
664bb74a-a208-4728-a3d6-4468eb01c8a0.name: Tableau Certified Associate Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Passing a 90-minute, knowledge-based proctored Tableau Certified Associate Consultant Exam

4d1a66f7-f678-4a43-b794-b29636716b5f.description: Earners of the Create Views and Dashboards Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to create views and visually appealing dashboards, structure data using groups, bins, and sets, and apply sorting and filtering techniques to gain additional data insights.
4d1a66f7-f678-4a43-b794-b29636716b5f.name: Create Views and Dashboards

a3ae8e1f-d542-48d8-bca6-373c30e201a5.description: Earners of the Explore and Analyze Data Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to use calculations, LOD expressions, and table calculations to create new views and insights, and show data trends and forecasts.
a3ae8e1f-d542-48d8-bca6-373c30e201a5.name: Explore and Analyze Data

c85bfb3d-65d3-4b3e-bc3b-01f95ce50f3d.description: Earners of the Tableau Desktop Certified Data Analyst title use their skills to enable stakeholders to make business decisions by understanding the business problem, identifying data to explore for analysis, and delivering actionable insights.
c85bfb3d-65d3-4b3e-bc3b-01f95ce50f3d.name: Tableau Certified Data Analyst

badge_template_activities.title: Pass hands-on, proctored Tableau Certified Data Analyst exam

9bd9f866-cfcb-44b9-b811-a7061def0f15.description: Earners of the Build Visualizations and Dashboards Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to create visualizations, dashboards, and stories, and use filtering, sorting, and calculations to get additional data insights.
9bd9f866-cfcb-44b9-b811-a7061def0f15.name: Build Visualizations and Dashboards

1d32ba0a-4831-4e7f-a4ae-ff706513f00a.description: Earners of the Publish and Manage Content Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to publish data sources and workbooks on Tableau Server and Tableau Online using a pre-defined governance model, schedule extract refreshes, and manage published content.
1d32ba0a-4831-4e7f-a4ae-ff706513f00a.name: Publish and Manage Content

04ce2609-7f5f-47a4-a67f-e6b5a7f2ba27.description: Earners of the Interact with Dashboards and Reports Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to interact with dashboards and reports for additional insights, and use the data to make more informed decisions for their line of business.
04ce2609-7f5f-47a4-a67f-e6b5a7f2ba27.name: Interact with Dashboards and Reports

22850853-97fb-4467-9c0f-f1940a22b68f.description: Earners of the Tableau Server Certified Associate title have a broad understanding of Tableau Server functionality in a single-machine environment. They can plan a deployment, install and configure server, administer users, groups, projects, and content, backup, restore, upgrade, and troubleshoot Tableau Server problems.
22850853-97fb-4467-9c0f-f1940a22b68f.name: Tableau Server Certified Associate

badge_template_activities.title: Pass 90-minute, performance-based, proctored Server Certified Associate exam

d1f7c6d7-fc55-49c6-8e47-e8afa549b074.description: Earners of the Get Started with Tableau Skill Badge for the Author learning path have shown competency in the foundational skills needed to start data analysis with Tableau. The skills acquired with this badge include core data literacy and Tableau concepts, and creating a Tableau workbook with basic charts.
d1f7c6d7-fc55-49c6-8e47-e8afa549b074.name: Get Started with Tableau - Author

c40c908f-73f1-456c-b6a4-8754a4f75598.description: Earners of the Design Informative and Visually Appealing Dashboards Skill Badge have shown competency in designing visually appealing, functional, and impactful visualizations that help stakeholders across their organization absorb information quickly and easily.
c40c908f-73f1-456c-b6a4-8754a4f75598.name: Design Informative and Visually Appealing Dashboards

1c4217af-a4bf-4ce6-a74a-9dffbb91450c.description: Earners of the Tableau Early Bird badge are early adopters of Tableau Certification! They are one of the first 1,000 to achieve the Tableau Certified Data Analyst title.
1c4217af-a4bf-4ce6-a74a-9dffbb91450c.name: Tableau Early Bird

badge_template_activities.title: Be an early adopter of new Tableau Certification titles.

98ab0f1e-d46c-4f68-b0e0-3b5f88e3a01c.description: Earners of the Tableau Desktop Certified Professional title tell compelling stories with data. They can quickly analyze unfamiliar data to determine the most effective way to visually communicate insights to the intended audience and present a polished, cohesive, captivating story using visual best practices.
98ab0f1e-d46c-4f68-b0e0-3b5f88e3a01c.name: Tableau Desktop Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Pass three-hour, hands-on, proctored Desktop Certified Professional exam
Previously passed two-hour, hands-on, proctored Desktop Certified Associate exam
This exam is now retired. Click here to see all available certification offerings.

a1971846-610c-48b4-abf7-b8875b33f813.description: Earners of the Connect to Data and Work with Views Skill Badge for the Author learning path have shown competency in their ability to create groups, use filters, map geographic data, and build views using Ask Data. The skills acquired with this badge include creating a story to walk viewers through the data discovery process and bringing views together in an interactive dashboard for sharing and analysis.
a1971846-610c-48b4-abf7-b8875b33f813.name: Connect to Data and Work with Views - Author

3a9555a8-2dc8-4184-a517-7fae6f075654.description: Earners of the Explore, Analyze, and Share Data Skill Badge for the Author learning path have shown competency in their ability to create new views, spot trends, publish and interact with content, and explore and interact with data with Explain Data. The skills acquired with this badge include working with calculated fields, using quick table calculations, and creating interactive views using parameters.
3a9555a8-2dc8-4184-a517-7fae6f075654.name: Explore, Analyze, and Share Data - Author

0ba9802a-c08c-48da-a38b-3ebfdff90989.description: Earners of the Manage and Maintain Tableau Server Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to manage, monitor, and maintain sites on Tableau Server or Tableau Online, including how to manage users and set permissions as well as best practices when working with tasks.
0ba9802a-c08c-48da-a38b-3ebfdff90989.name: Manage and Maintain Tableau Sites

cda2a623-e702-4a0f-a69c-a63c7aee7c30.description: Earners of the Build Community to Promote Data Culture Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to coordinate efforts related to user enablement around communications, engagement, and support to build a data-centric community.
cda2a623-e702-4a0f-a69c-a63c7aee7c30.name: Build Community to Promote Data Culture

5e4255c0-01b3-4a60-a976-282cf74a26cb.description: Earners of the Analyze and Model Data to Create Insights Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to analyze and model data, and derive valuable insights for large and varied data sets.
5e4255c0-01b3-4a60-a976-282cf74a26cb.name: Analyze and Model Data to Create Insights

d025ea72-32b8-4700-a27b-d16fd2ce6879.description: Earners of the Drive Data Culture and Strategies Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to promote the data culture, and drive the decisions and strategies that enable their organization’s continued growth and success.
d025ea72-32b8-4700-a27b-d16fd2ce6879.name: Drive Data Culture and Strategies

91beaea7-98a5-4ca5-baf7-a1c1da9ebd2c.description: Earners of the Tableau Certified Associate Architect are proficient at engaging with customers to design, deploy, monitor, and maintain a scalable Tableau platform that meets best practices and drives business value.
91beaea7-98a5-4ca5-baf7-a1c1da9ebd2c.name: Tableau Certified Associate Architect

badge_template_activities.title: Pass 90-minute, knowledge-based Tableau Certified Associate Architect Exam

c07f2b5c-77d0-4f94-b69f-170e1b2fd9e4.description: Earners of the Manage and Maintain Tableau Server Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to deploy Tableau Server in their organization and ensure that their organization's installation of Tableau Server runs smoothly.
c07f2b5c-77d0-4f94-b69f-170e1b2fd9e4.name: Manage and Maintain Tableau Server

7f32470d-073d-4e30-8849-bab7f3d94d52.description: Earners of the Plan and Build Tableau Server Deployments Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to plan and design successful Tableau Server deployments, including understanding server processes, integrating with preferred authentication options, monitoring, performance tuning, and scaling to meet ongoing enterprise demand.
7f32470d-073d-4e30-8849-bab7f3d94d52.name: Plan and Build Tableau Server Deployments

5f67d447-1bca-476a-b5a7-5a050da1917d.description: Earners of the Manage Data Sources and Data Quality Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to manage data sources for an organization, ensure that there are documented procedures and guidelines for data access, and plan enterprise-wide data governance, control and compliance policies.
5f67d447-1bca-476a-b5a7-5a050da1917d.name: Manage Data Sources and Data Quality

c1982baf-b391-437f-ab68-becc69f5183d.description: Earners of the Tableau Server Certified Professional title have a comprehensive understanding of Tableau Server functionality in a single-machine and enterprise configuration. They can plan and implement a high-availability (HA) installation, as well as configure, monitor, maintain, and troubleshoot all aspects of a production environment.
c1982baf-b391-437f-ab68-becc69f5183d.name: Tableau Server Certified Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Pass 7 hour, hands-on, proctored Server Certified Professional exam
Previously passed 90-minute, hands-on, proctored Server Certified Associate exam
This exam is now retired. Click here to develop a full understanding of what this achievement means.

21fcf68b-cf2d-429e-a234-c922ac1583d1.description: Earners of the Create and Embed Custom Experiences Skill Badge have shown competency in their ability to translate the needs of the business into the software tools, applications, and automated processes that keep their organizations lean, smart, and efficient.
21fcf68b-cf2d-429e-a234-c922ac1583d1.name: Create and Embed Custom Experiences

bc3deb70-93b7-4f8d-82ed-9f07b55d793f.description: Iron Viz is the world’s largest data visualization skill-based competition. People of all skill levels can be a part of Iron Viz. Each qualifier is centered around a different theme, and contestants are required to source their own data. Contestants’ visualizations are scored on analysis, storytelling, and design. After which, three finalists are selected to advance to the final round by a group of esteemed community judges.
bc3deb70-93b7-4f8d-82ed-9f07b55d793f.name: Iron Viz 2023 Participant

alignments.name: Enter the 2023 Iron Viz Qualifier Contest

badge_template_activities.title: Submit a data visualization within the contest window (October 3 - October 31, 2022).
Source or create your own data set.
Visualization topic must be appropriate to qualifier contest theme (Games).
